name: bcl2fastq_by_lane
title: SCGPM Bcl2fastq
summary: Convert raw Illumina sequencing results to FastQ files
description: Converts Illumina data from Bcl to FastqQ format, demultiplexing barcoded samples if appropriate. This app is designed to be run on data from a single flowcell lane.

inputSpec.name: project_dxid
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus project to store output files

inputSpec.name: lane_index
inputSpec.label: Flowcell lane index
inputSpec.help: Lane index will be 1-8 for most platforms. MiSeqs only have one lane so will always be 1.

inputSpec.name: project_folder
inputSpec.label: Output location
inputSpec.help: Project and folder location for output files: '/folder'

inputSpec.name: barcodes_file
inputSpec.label: Barcodes file
inputSpec.help: Text file with one barcode per line: 'ATCGT-GTACT A1'

inputSpec.name: properties
inputSpec.label: Properties
inputSpec.help: Dictionary of additional properties to be attached to all jobs & files

inputSpec.name: tags
inputSpec.label: Tags
inputSpec.help: List of tags to be attached to jobs & files

inputSpec.name: ignore_missing_bcls
inputSpec.label: --ignore-missing-bcls
inputSpec.help: Missing or corrupt files are ignored. Assumes Passing Filter for all clusters in tiles where filter files are missing.

inputSpec.name: ignore_missing_positions
inputSpec.label: --ignore-missing-positions
inputSpec.help: (bcl2fastq2) Missing or corrupt positions files are ignored

inputSpec.name: ignore_missing_filter
inputSpec.label: --ignore-missing-filter
inputSpec.help: Missing or corrupt filter files are ignored. Assumes Passing Filter for all clusters in tiles where filter files are missing.

inputSpec.name: tiles
inputSpec.label: --tiles
inputSpec.help: (1112) Only used in test mode. See --tiles argument of the Illumina tool bcl2fastq. Takes a comma-separated list of regular expressions to select only a subset of the tiles available in the flow-cell.
